title: "Drew Carey made a radio show with AI. Fans weren't pleased."
excerpt: "Drew Carey isn't afraid of AI. Instead, The Price is Right host and longtime improv comedian is embracing the technology. During a recent episode of his SiriusXM radio show, \"Friday Night Freakout,\" Carey used an artificially generated version of his voice to handle most of his DJ work,"
